titles.title: A concurrent resolution to authorize a correction in the enrollment of H.R. 4585.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 10/7/1988--Introduced. Makes corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 4585 (extension of authorization of appropriations for the Taft Institute).
